changes: Changed strength scores from 1/10/100/1000 to 1-10 scale
Updated relationship types (AND to ALL, XOR/MIN_OF to ANY_N)
Added safety and compliance fields to SSRs

metadata.description: Complete requirement hierarchy with constraint relationships for Requirements MAS

UC5.name: Industrial Automation and OT Machinery Monitoring

SSR1_1_1.name: Real-Time Thermal Imaging
SSR1_1_1.reasoning: Early detection of hot spots prevents equipment failure worth millions

SSR1_1_2.name: Compact Form Factor
SSR1_1_2.reasoning: Must fit within electrical cabinet constraints

SSR1_1_3.name: Environmental Protection
SSR1_1_3.reasoning: Substation environment with dust, moisture, and temperature extremes

SSR1_2_1.name: Fast Protection Coordination
SSR1_2_1.reasoning: Breaker coordination requires <4ms response to prevent cascading failures

SSR1_2_2.name: GOOSE Messaging
SSR1_2_2.reasoning: IEC 61850 substation automation standard requires GOOSE

SSR1_2_3.name: Relay I/O Interface
SSR1_2_3.reasoning: Interface with protection relays and circuit breakers

SSR2_1_1.name: Solar Panel Telemetry
SSR2_1_1.reasoning: Remote sites require wireless and ultra-low power for solar operation

SSR2_1_2.name: Battery Management
SSR2_1_2.reasoning: Monitor and optimize battery charge cycles

SSR2_1_3.name: Weather Station Integration
SSR2_1_3.reasoning: Correlate solar output with weather conditions

SSR2_2_1.name: Solar Performance Analytics
SSR2_2_1.reasoning: AI-based optimization of solar farm efficiency

SSR2_2_2.name: Multi-Site Integration
SSR2_2_2.reasoning: Aggregate data from multiple solar installations

SSR3_1_1.name: Multi-Axis Coordination
SSR3_1_1.reasoning: Synchronized motion requires <1ms deterministic control for precision

SSR3_1_2.name: Trajectory Planning
SSR3_1_2.reasoning: Complex path calculations and motion profiles

SSR3_1_3.name: Safety Integration
SSR3_1_3.reasoning: Emergency stop and safety-rated I/O for personnel protection

SSR3_2_1.name: Encoder Feedback
SSR3_2_1.reasoning: High-resolution position feedback for closed-loop control

SSR3_2_2.name: I/O Response Time
SSR3_2_2.reasoning: Fast I/O for motion control feedback loops

SSR4_1_1.name: Real-Time Image Analysis
SSR4_1_1.reasoning: Production line speed requires fast defect detection

SSR4_1_3.name: Lighting Control
SSR4_1_3.reasoning: Synchronized strobe lighting for image capture

SSR4_1_4.name: MES Integration
SSR4_1_4.reasoning: Report defects to manufacturing execution system

SSR4_1_5.name: Defect History
SSR4_1_5.reasoning: Track defect patterns for quality improvement

SSR4_2_1.name: AI Defect Classification
SSR4_2_1.reasoning: Neural network inference for defect categorization

SSR5_1_1.name: Multi-Protocol Gateway
SSR5_1_1.reasoning: Bridge between legacy and modern industrial protocols

SSR5_1_2.name: Legacy Device Integration
SSR5_1_2.reasoning: Connect older equipment with serial interfaces

SSR5_1_3.name: Data Aggregation
SSR5_1_3.reasoning: Collect and normalize data from multiple sources

SSR5_2_1.name: High-Speed Vibration Sampling
SSR5_2_1.reasoning: Capture vibration frequencies for predictive maintenance

SSR5_2_2.name: FFT Analysis
SSR5_2_2.reasoning: Real-time frequency analysis for fault detection

SSR5_2_3.name: Predictive Maintenance
SSR5_2_3.reasoning: AI-based failure prediction from vibration patterns

SSR6_1_2.name: Chemical Dosing Control
SSR6_1_2.reasoning: Precise chemical addition for water treatment

SSR6_1_3.name: SCADA Integration
SSR6_1_3.reasoning: Central monitoring and control of water treatment

SSR6_2_2.name: Remote Telemetry
SSR6_2_2.reasoning: Satellite or cellular communication from remote locations

SSR7_1_1.name: High-Speed Vehicle Processing
SSR7_1_1.reasoning: Process vehicles at highway speeds without stopping

SSR7_2_2.name: AGV Platform Integration
SSR7_2_2.reasoning: Compact controller for automated guided vehicles

SSR7_2_3.name: Warehouse Navigation
SSR7_2_3.reasoning: Real-time path planning and obstacle avoidance

SSR8_1_2.name: Large Point Count
SSR8_1_2.reasoning: Monitor hundreds of HVAC sensors and actuators

SSR10_1_1.name: Wide Area Monitoring
SSR10_1_1.reasoning: Monitor distributed wells across large geographic area

SSR10_1_2.name: Remote Equipment Control
SSR10_1_2.reasoning: Control pumps and valves at remote locations

SSR11_1_1.name: Universal Protocol Gateway
SSR11_1_1.reasoning: Connect diverse industrial devices to cloud

SSR11_1_2.name: Data Normalization
SSR11_1_2.reasoning: Convert various data formats to standard format

SSR11_2_1.name: Edge Analytics
SSR11_2_1.reasoning: Process data locally to reduce cloud traffic

SSR12_1_1.name: Real-Time Production Monitoring
SSR12_1_1.reasoning: Track OEE and production metrics in real-time

SSR12_2_1.name: Enterprise System Bridge
SSR12_2_1.reasoning: Connect shop floor to ERP/MES systems

SSR12_2_2.name: Data Synchronization
SSR12_2_2.reasoning: Real-time sync between OT and IT systems

CSR_AI_PROCESSING.name: AI/ML Processing Capability
CSR_AI_PROCESSING.description: Neural network inference and AI workloads

CSR_UTILITY_PROTOCOLS.name: Utility Industry Protocols
CSR_UTILITY_PROTOCOLS.description: Power and water utility communication standards

CSR_EDGE_PROCESSING.name: Edge Computing Capabilities
CSR_EDGE_PROCESSING.description: Local processing to reduce cloud dependency

CSR_MOBILE_PLATFORM.name: Mobile Platform Integration
CSR_MOBILE_PLATFORM.description: Vehicle or robot mounting with vibration resistance

CSR_SERIAL_COMM.name: Serial Communication Interface
CSR_SERIAL_COMM.description: RS-232/485/422 serial communication for legacy devices

CSR_DIGITAL_IO.name: Digital I/O Interface
CSR_DIGITAL_IO.description: Digital input/output for control and monitoring

CSR_LARGE_SCALE_DATA.name: Large-Scale Data Processing
CSR_LARGE_SCALE_DATA.description: Processing and storing data from massive deployments

CSR_SAFETY.name: Machine Safety Integration
CSR_SAFETY.description: Safety-rated I/O and emergency stop functions

CSR_POSITION_FEEDBACK.name: High-Resolution Position Feedback
CSR_POSITION_FEEDBACK.description: Encoder and resolver interfaces for motion control

CSR_DATA_AGGREGATION.name: Data Aggregation and Normalization
CSR_DATA_AGGREGATION.description: Collect and standardize data from multiple sources

CSR_HIGH_IO_DENSITY.name: High I/O Density
CSR_HIGH_IO_DENSITY.description: Maximum I/O channels in minimum space

wireless_options.description: Select one or more wireless technologies

real_time_suite.description: All required for deterministic real-time communication

power_performance_mutex.description: Cannot combine ultra-low power with high performance

redundancy_requirements.description: High availability requires at least 2 redundancy features

industrial_protocols.description: Preferred protocol order for industrial applications

fieldbus_selection.description: Select appropriate fieldbus for motion control

tsn_selection.description: Ultra-low latency requires TSN and time sync

protocol_gateway_suite.description: Gateway must support at least 3 protocols

consolidations_performed: CSR_POWER_MGMT and CSR_POWER_LOW merged into CSR_POWER_EFFICIENT

mandatory.description: Must have - complete filtering if not satisfied

important.description: Highly recommended - significant penalty if not satisfied

recommended.description: Nice to have - minor penalty if not satisfied

agent_instructions.requirement_matching: Match user input to UCSRSSR hierarchy
agent_instructions.relationship_processing: Apply constraint_relationships (ALL, ANY_N, PRIORITY, IF_THEN, MUTEX)
agent_instructions.conflict_detection: Check CSR incompatible_with and constraint_relationships MUTEX
agent_instructions.output_generation: Produce final constraint set as specifications
